name: Fashion brands
tag_list: apparel, footwear, eyewear, bags, luggage, wallets, watches
overview:
HW-Brands Ltd is a fashion brands licensing agency, specializing in international well known brands, available for licensing. We offer great names with manufacturing rights, comfortable and attractive commercial terms, and licensees support department, providing style guides, art works, photos and designs. If you are interested, we can offer you license for your products. You can produce the products collection with the brand name and sale them to your customers, in exchange for royalties from sales.

Brands available for Licensing: NO FEAR , DUNLOP, MARILYN MONROE, BHPC, SLAZENGER, PUNKY FISH, PATRICK COX, LONSDALE, EXTREME SPORTS, , PIPELINE, ,KANGOL,USA-PRO,PINK COOKIE, ACUPUNCTURE,SPYKER,VOODOO DOLLS,SWISS EAGLE, PETER ENGLAND,TOOTAL,AIRWALK, LA AVENUE, LEONARDO DA VINCI, VINCENT VAN GOGH, ANTIGUA, LAMBRETTA,

Categories available: Apparel, Footwear, Eyewear, bags, Luggage, Wallets, Watches, Mobile phone accessories, jewelry, Gifts, Home Textile, paper products, Accessories, etc
